channel.title: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: Basics
item.description: Chapter 1 Basics Discover what this Hugo theme is all about and the core-concepts behind it.

item.title: Content
item.description: Chapter 2 Content Find out how to create and organize your content quickly and intuitively.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: Chapter 3 Shortcodes Hugo uses Markdown for its simple content format. However, there are a lot of things that Markdown doesnâ€™t support well. You could use pure HTML to expand possibilities. But this happens to be a bad idea. Everyone uses Markdown because it’s pure and simple to read even non-rendered. You should avoid HTML to keep it as simple as possible. To avoid this limitations, Hugo created shortcodes. A shortcode is a simple snippet inside a page.

item.title: This could be yours
item.description: Chapter 4 This could be yours Start your success story. Now!

item.title: Tests
item.description: Chapter 5 Tests Some pages for internal testing of differnt styles Code Some testing for different styles used in syntax highlightning and preformatted blocks Images Some testing for different styles of image links Links Some testing for different styles of links
